title: I'm Struggling to Actually Like My Kids
description:
In today’s show, we hear from a man engaged to a married woman who just learned she’s also cheating on him (yeah, it’s a lot), a mom struggling to like her defiant child, and a wife ready to leave her husband who’s gambled away $100,000 in five years.
  I had kids with a married woman & now she’s cheating on me
 I’m struggling to actually like my kids; they seem to bring out the worst in me
 My husband is addicted to gambling and I’m ready to leave him
 Lyrics of the Day: "The Age of Worry" - John Mayer
  Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
  Support Our Sponsors:
  BetterHelp

  Resources:
  Own Your Past, Change Your Future

In today’s show, we hear from a man engaged to a married woman who just learned she’s also cheating on him (yeah, it’s a lot), a mom struggling to like her defiant child, and a wife ready to leave her husband who’s gambled away $100,000 in five years.
